document.full_text: levi strauss & co  agreed to pay more than $1 million in back wages for overtime to about 600 employees after the u.s. department of labor found that the jeans maker failed to record all the hours employees worked in its payroll system.
document.title: levi strauss to pay over $1 million in overtime back wages
lines_and_colors: levi strauss & co  agreed to pay more than $1 million in back wages for overtime to about 600 employees after the u.s. department of labor found that the jeans maker failed to record all the hours employees worked in its payroll system.
